training.title: Training Plans
training.suggestPlanDescription: Describe your horse and your goals to get a weekly training plan suggested by AI.
training.horseDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe your horse: age, breed, temperament, current training level...
training.desiredOutcomeePlaceholder: What do you want to achieve with this training plan?
training.apiKeyRequired: Make sure you have the GOOGLE_API_KEY environment variable configured.
training.temporarilyDisabledDescription: AI training plan generation is temporarily disabled in this static version. This feature will be available when the application runs with full server functionality.
training.willBeAvailable: This function will be available when the application runs with full server.
training.validationError: Validation error. Please check the fields.
training.horseDescriptionMinLength: Horse description must be at least 10 characters.
training.desiredOutcomeMinLength: Desired outcome must be at least 10 characters.
training.noApiKey: Google API key is not configured. Cannot generate plan.
training.aiDidNotGeneratePlan: The AI model did not generate a training plan.
training.invalidApiKey: API Error: The Google API key is not valid or does not have the necessary permissions.
training.unknownError: An unknown error occurred while generating the training plan.

settings.title: Account Settings

home.description: Comprehensive management system for stables and horses. Sign in or register to continue.
